rukus.text: Alaha srisati nu pahili vara paida karada hai, uha hi isanu dubara paida karega. Phira tusim use vala vapisa more javoge
Ate ki'amata de dina aparadhi loka hairana rahi janage
Ate unham de sarikam vicom unham da ko'i sifarasi nahim hovega. Ate uha apane sarikam tom inakara karana vale ho janage
Ate jisa dina ki'amata avegi usa dina sare loka vakhare-vakhare ho janage
Isa la'i jihare imana li'a'e ate bhale karama kite uha ika baga vica khasi nala rahinage
Ate jinham lokam ne sadi'am a'itam nu jhuthala'i'a ate pa'e honage
Isa la'i tusim pavitara alaha nu yada karom jadom tusim sama ate savera (alaha nu yada) karade ho. Ate akasam te dharati vica
sari prasasa use la'i hi hai, tisare pahira ate jadom tusim zuhara (dupahira) yada karade ho
Uha jivata nu mritaka vica kadhada hai ate mritaka nu jivata vicom'. Ate uha dharati nu vi usade mritaka ho jana tom ba'ada jivita karada hai. Ate isa tar'ham tusim loka kadhe javoge
